column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Okay this is Chicago and everyone has their own personal opinions about who has the best pizza in town
column2: and what constitutes 'good' pizza.  I think there are three main categories of pizza
column4: the 'pan' stuff that has some depth
column5: and the 'deep dish' or 'stuffed' pizza that is just massive.  Lou's is hands down the best middle of the road 'pan' style Chicago Pizza.
